== What? ==

GUADEC is the GNOME Users and Developers European Conference. It is a big get together for GNOME users and developers who are scattered around the world to talk about GNOME, its future direction and to showcase the latest technology (and to drink beer).

GNOME is the desktop "graphical environment" for plain Ubuntu and Edubuntu, it provides most of the applications you see in the menus on a fresh install and provides the tool kit for many other applications. 

More info at http://guadec.org/ or by <nowiki>[[http://www.uk.gnome.org/?page=Contact|contacting the GNOME UK Team]]</nowiki>.

== When? ==

Sunday July 15th - Saturday July 21st 2007.

== Where? ==

<nowiki>[[http://www.conservatoire.uce.ac.uk/about/directions|The UCE Birmingham Conservatoire]]</nowiki>, Birmingham, UK.
